## NodeImageBitmapConsumer class

Abstract class to base [NodeImageBitmap](./canvas-cleave.nodeimagebitmap.md) consumers on.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare abstract class NodeImageBitmapConsumer 
```
